abstract: No reason to fly off to Switzerland for snow sports, when they can come to you, as the annual Freeze Festival runs at London's Battersea Power Station on Oct. 28 and 29.
snippet: No reason to fly off to Switzerland for snow sports, when they can come to you, as the annual Freeze Festival runs at London's Battersea Power Station on Oct. 28 and 29.
lead_paragraph: No reason to fly off to Switzerland for snow sports, when they can come to you, as the annual Freeze Festival runs at the Battersea Power Station in London on Oct. 28 and 29. England's biggest winter sports and music event, the festival features some of the world's best skiers and snowboarders in a series of dramatic events.

headline.main: Ski Jumps and Live Tunes at London's Freeze Festival
